titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Microwave Research Institute Technical Reports RG.031

publicationstmt.publisher: Poly Archives at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology

address.addressline: Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2016-12-05T14:57-0500

did.unittitle: Guide to the Microwave Research Institute Technical Reports

repository.corpname: Poly Archives at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology

otherfindaid.head: Sponsor note
otherfindaid.p: This project was made possible in part by a generous grant from the History Programs, American Institute of Physics.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical note
bioghist.p: The Microwave Research Institute was founded at the Polytechnic Institute of Brooklyn (now the Tandon School of Engineering) by Ernst Weber in 1945. It was later renamed the Weber Research Institute in his honor.

arrangement.head: Arrangement note
arrangement.p: The technical reports are arranged by PIB-MRI number. These numbers are typically chronological, but not always. These reports contain multiple report numbering systems and were often cross-listed with military projects. Please consult the archivist if your citation contains a report number other than PIB-MRI.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Please observe copyright restrictions. Permission to view materials does not confer permission to reproduce or publish. If material is quoted, please use the following citation format:

Identification of item, date; RG-031: The Microwave Research Institute Technical Reports; box number; folder number; Poly Archives & Special Collections at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use note
userestrict.p: Permission to publish materials must be obtained from:
Poly Archives & Special Collections Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology 5 MetroTech Center Brooklyn, NY 11201
Phone: (646) 997-3943 Email Poly Archivist, Lindsay Anderberg: landerberg@nyu.edu
The Poly Archives may not hold the copyright to all reports listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: At this time, PIB-MRI reports from 1942-1963 are listed. Please check back frequently, as new reports are added.
